text: -  External radiation therapy for patients who cannot have surgery.     - A clinical trial of radiation therapy following surgery.         Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with stage II non-small cell lung cancer. For more specific results, refine the search by using other search features, such as the location of the trial, the type of treatment, or the name of the drug. Talk with your doctor about clinical trials that may be right for you
